subject: Re: cannot run testing with UI TestRunner?
msgSnippet: There is a simple response- someone write a test case for the class loader that doesn t pass, and if it passed then the code in question would work. Goodness
messageBody:
There is a simple response- someone write a test case for the class
loader that doesn't pass, and if it passed then the code in question
would work. Goodness knows the loader could use a bunch more tests.

Part of the political statement of JUnit is that as the reporter of
bugs you have the additional responsibility to track down the bugs
far enough that the provider has an objective measure of whether they
will have satisfied you. We could debate whether this is a better, or
even reasonable, social contract, but it's how Erich and I work.

Kent
